comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Doumer. You'll see a cut-out of this photograph on the wikipedia page. Former Governor-General of French Indo-China and French President. Assassinated in 1932.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Out to Lunch:  Thank you for your information on Paul Doumer.  We will add some of it to the record description when we update.

comment.author: 45253757@N00
comment._content: Hi Library! Perhaps also of interest is the 'Villa Blanche' or White Villa which was built for Doumer as a summer residence in the Vietnamese coastal town of Vung Tau. It is now a landmark building and well preserved with some of the original furnishings intact. Doumer named the villa after his favorite daughter 'Blanche'. I took this photo of the Villa in 2009 and you are free to use it: You'll find some more information on the villa here: iguide.travel/Vung_Tau/Sights

comment._content: What event made him newsworthy early in 1914 (when the photo was placed in the Bain News Agency's photostream)?
